name: Wild West Runner
description:
Meet the most addictive game in 2018. Help the sheriff to run through the wild west by shooting down bandits.

Very easy, one-hand controls, just "hold and swipe" to fire the direction you are aimed.

Only 1% of the players reached the last level!
publishers: OMICRON BILISIM HIZMETLERI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
